field.label: max-width 360:
field.comment: Number product show in screen ( Size <= 360 )

field.label: max-width 479:
field.comment: Number product show in screen ( 360 < Size < 480 )

field.comment: Number product show in screen ( 480 <= Size < 576 )

field.comment: Number product show in screen ( 992 <= Size < 1200 )

field.comment: Number product show in screen ( 1200 <= Size < 1480 )

field.comment: Number product show in screen ( 1366 <= Size < 1920 )

field.label: min-width 1920:
field.comment: Number product show in screen ( Size >= 1920 )

field.label: Fake times purchased
field.comment: a few minutes ago, 5 minutes ago, 15 minutes ago

field.label: Fake order shipping address
field.comment: Hanoi - VN, New York - US, Sydney - Australia

field.label: First Time Show Notify
field.comment: First Time Show wait notify when start

field.label: Don't show again when close
field.comment: Don't show again in current page or other pages when customer click to button close

field.label: Background Image :
field.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png.

field.label: You can edit content newsletter popup in: Admin Panel > Content > Blocks > newsletter_popup
Basic Font Size :
field.comment: Size of the regular text. Font size of most of the other elements will be calculated relative to this value.

field.label: Google Fonts :
field.comment: Font preview is available on Google Web Fonts

field.label: Flag Image :
field.comment: Allowed file types: jpg, jpeg, gif, png.

field.label: Width of the box in pixel:
field.comment: Width of the box in pixel

field.label: Height of the box in pixel:
field.comment: Height of the box in pixel

field.label: Connections:
field.comment: Show a sample of this many users who have liked this page

field.label: Streams:
field.comment: Show the profile stream for the public profile

field.label: Header:
field.comment: Show the 'find us on Facebook' bar at top

field.label: Facebook Page ID
field.comment: Generate Page Id : GoTo Page -> Setting -> Page info

field.label: Access Token:
field.comment: Get access Token follow guide here: https://developers.facebook.com/docs/instagram-api/getting-started/
